name: Turmeric Powder
description: Turmeric powder is a bright yellow spice made by grinding dried roots of the Curcuma longa plant. Widely known for its earthy aroma and warm, slightly bitter flavor, turmeric is a staple in Indian, Southeast Asian, and Middle Eastern cuisines. It is also valued for its natural coloring properties and is often used in curries, rice dishes, and marinades.
